channel.title: Dropbox never working :(
channel.description:
i upload my cache.zip to my drop box but when client is loading files it goes "error loading..please report!" wth! can someone teach me the proper way and if i have to code anything else other then changing links on: client.java; and cache downloader.java?
please help me??! i really need this!
